LanguageData.RPP_Component.label: Robotic Component
LanguageData.RPP_Component.description: Robotic Components are used as logic circuits within a robotic matrix.
LanguageData.RPP_Matrix_I.label: Robotic Matrix (Simple)
LanguageData.RPP_Matrix_I.description: A robotic logical matrix. Engineered with a Simple instruction set allowing it to perform suited tasks at an amateur-class skill level.
LanguageData.RPP_Matrix_II.label: Robotic Matrix (Basic)
LanguageData.RPP_Matrix_II.description: A robotic logical matrix. Engineered with a Simple instruction set allowing it to perform suited tasks at a profesional-class skill level.
LanguageData.RPP_Matrix_III.label: Robotic Matrix (Intermediate)
LanguageData.RPP_Matrix_III.description: A robotic logical matrix. Engineered with a Simple instruction set allowing it to perform suited tasks at a master-class skill level.
LanguageData.RPP_Matrix_IV.label: Robotic Matrix (Advanced)
LanguageData.RPP_Matrix_IV.description: A robotic logical matrix. Engineered with a Simple instruction set allowing it to perform suited tasks at a system-master-class skill level.
LanguageData.RPP_Matrix_V.label: Robotic Matrix (Anti-Logic)
LanguageData.RPP_Matrix_V.description: A robotic Anti-Logic matrix. Capable of performing Godlike tasks. (NP=P)
